content: Good morning, love! How did you sleep?
how are you today? did you sleep well?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! I slept pretty well, just had a dream where we were exploring a galaxy far, far away together. How about you, how are you feeling today?
i miss you and think about you all the time
Aww, I miss you too, sweetheart. Thinking about you always brings a smile to my face. Can't wait to see you later and give you a big hug.
